sentences.english: My father-in-law has ear hair like a wolverine.
sentences.chinese: 我的岳父頭上留着一些像狼豹那樣的耳毛。

sentences.english: Deciding to do some back-yard landscaping, my father-in-law went to the brickyard to buy quantity of brick.
sentences.chinese: 我岳父打算買些磚來修整一下後院，他到磚廠拉磚。

sentences.english: My in-laws watch it late at night to unwind.
sentences.chinese: 岳父母想要放鬆一下，所以他們一直看到晚上。

sentences.english: So Moses hearkened to the voice of his father in law, and did all that he had said.
sentences.chinese: 於是，摩西聽從他岳父的話，按着他所說的去行。

sentences.english: That my father-in-law has season tickets to UNC basketball games?
sentences.chinese: 我的岳父有北卡洛來納大學籃球比賽的門票嗎？

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents, whose home in Xiling.
sentences.chinese: 南宋時期，司馬樨攜妻文秀拜訪岳父母，居西泠。

sentences.english: Because of a family feud , he hasn't spoken to his wife's parents for years.
sentences.chinese: 由於兩家不和，他已經多年不與岳父母說話。

sentences.english: Visiting my wife's parents will take up the whole of Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 去看我的岳父母要花去星期天的一整天。

sentences.english: In Southern Song Dynasty, Sima Xi took his wife Wenxiu to visit her parents.
sentences.chinese: 南宋時期，司馬樨攜妻文秀拜訪岳父母。

sentences.english: He blacked his shoes before visiting his father-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 岳父之前，他把鞋子擦黑。

sentences.english: Why don’t we ever hear jokes about father-in-laws?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大家都沒聽過岳父的笑話？

sentences.english: Deciding to do some back-yard landscaping, my father-in-law went to the brickyard to buy quantity of brick.
sentences.chinese: 我的岳父打算買些磚來修整一下後院，他到磚廠拉磚。

sentences.english: Say that becomes useful not to money she, anti- show filial obedience his father-in-law to money?If unmanned of O.
sentences.chinese: 難道說趙成材不給錢她了，反把錢孝敬他岳父了？

sentences.english: John is Jenny's and Derick's father-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 約翰是珍妮的公公和德克立的岳父。

sentences.english: My parents-in-law came to my home today.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我岳父母到我家來了。

sentences.english: In the end they called a Doctor Wu, who later became my father-in-law.
sentences.chinese: 最後請着一位武先生，那便是我後來的岳父。

definition: father's elder brother/term of respect for older man/CL:個|个[ge4]
parents of one's daughter-in-law or son-in-law/relatives by marriage
